A small amount with water goes a very long way. Totally Recommend!

column6: Dr Bronner's does it all, and does it right.
column9: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2018
column14: Dr. Bronner's is like a magical potion, it does it all. It's not as thick as I thought it would be, but it's very concentrated - doesn't take much to do the job. I love this stuff, I mostly use it in the shower - I wash my face with it when I'm having a breakout and it helps clear my face up, I wash my hair with it when I'm having bad dandruff and the flakes and itchiness go away, I wash my dog with it when her skin is irritated and it helps her too. Leaves a very clean feeling. I've used it as a bubble bath, but DONT PUT ALOT - the Tea Tree cooling/burning sensation was too much for my sensitive skin. It can also dry my face out if I'm using it too much, so I try not to wash my face with it every day. But overall highly recommended!
